grith.jgrith.myProxy
Class LocalMyProxy

java.lang.Object
  grith.jgrith.myProxy.LocalMyProxy

public class LocalMyProxy
extends Object

I called this class LocalMyProxy so that there is no confusion with the MyProxy class from the cog kit. Its main purpose is to contact a myproxy server, get a delegated proxy and save that proxy to disk. Also, this class has got hardcoded information about the APACGrid myproxy server in it...

Author:
Markus Binsteiner

DEFAULT_MYPROXY_SERVER

public static final org.globus.myproxy.MyProxy DEFAULT_MYPROXY_SERVER

Method Detail

getDelegationAndWriteToDisk

public static void getDelegationAndWriteToDisk(GSSCredential credential,
                                               String username,
                                               char[] passphrase,
                                               int lifetime_in_seconds)
                                        throws org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException,
                                               IOException,
                                               GSSException
Equivalent to the commandline myproxy-get-delegation command for getting a non-anonymous proxy. The proxy is retrieved from the MyProxy server and written to disk. This uses default server which is hardcoded in this class (LocalMyProxy.DEFAULT_MYPROXY_SERVER).

Parameters:
credential - the credential you want to use to authenticate against the MyProxy server
username - the username the user used when uploading the proxy
passphrase - the passphrase the user used when uploading the proxy
lifetime_in_seconds - how long you want the proxy to be valid
Throws:
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if something did not work
GSSException - if something is wrong with the retrieved proxy
IOException - if the proxy can't be written to disk

getDelegationAndWriteToDisk

public static void getDelegationAndWriteToDisk(String username,
                                               char[] passphrase,
                                               int lifetime_in_seconds)
                                        throws org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException,
                                               IOException,
                                               GSSException
Equivalent to the commandline myproxy-get-delegation command for getting an anonymous proxy. The proxy is retrieved from the MyProxy server and written to disk. This uses default server which is hardcoded in this class (DEFAULT_MYPROXY_SERVER).

Parameters:
username - the username the user used when uploading the proxy
passphrase - the passphrase the user used when uploading the proxy
lifetime_in_seconds - how long you want the proxy to be valid
Throws:
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if something did not work
GSSException - if something is wrong with the retrieved proxy
IOException - if the proxy can't be written to disk

getDelegationAndWriteToDisk

public static void getDelegationAndWriteToDisk(String myproxyServer,
                                               int myproxyPort,
                                               GSSCredential credential,
                                               String username,
                                               char[] passphrase,
                                               int lifetime_in_seconds)
                                        throws org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException,
                                               IOException,
                                               GSSException
Equivalent to the commandline myproxy-get-delegation command for getting a non-anonymous proxy

Parameters:
myproxyServer - the hostname of the myproxy server
myproxyPort - the port of the myproxy server (default is 443)
credential - the credential you want to use to authenticate against the MyProxy server
username - the username the user used when uploading the proxy
passphrase - the passphrase the user used when uploading the proxy
lifetime_in_seconds - how long you want the proxy to be valid
Throws:
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if something did not work
GSSException - if something is wrong with the retrieved proxy
IOException - if the proxy can't be written to disk

getDelegationAndWriteToDisk

public static void getDelegationAndWriteToDisk(String myproxyServer,
                                               int myproxyPort,
                                               String username,
                                               char[] passphrase,
                                               int lifetime_in_secs)
                                        throws org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException,
                                               IOException,
                                               GSSException
Equivalent to the commandline myproxy-get-delegation command for getting an anonymous proxy. It retrieves a proxy from the MyProxy server and writes it to disk (/tmp/x509up_uXXXX on linux)

Parameters:
myproxyServer - the hostname of the myproxy server
myproxyPort - the port of the myproxy server (default is 443)
username - the username the user used when uploading the proxy
passphrase - the passphrase the user used when uploading the proxy
lifetime_in_secs - how long you want the proxy to be valid
Throws:
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException - if something did not work
GSSException - if something is wrong with the retrieved proxy
IOException - if the proxy can't be written to disk
